db.mssql.connection.server.description: IP address of the database server.

db.mssql.connection.options.port.description: Port number to access the database server.

db.mssql.connection.dev.options.useColum.text: Return row a key-value pair collection
db.mssql.connection.dev.options.useColum.description: A boolean, that when true return rows as key-value collections else as an array.

db.mssql.connection.dev.options.rowColle.text: Return rows as a collection on request done
db.mssql.connection.dev.options.rowColle.description: A boolean, that when true will expose received rows in Requests' done* events.

db.mssql.connection.dev.options.rowColle.text: Return rows as a collection on request completion
db.mssql.connection.dev.options.rowColle.description: A boolean, that when true will expose received rows in Requests' completion callback.
